snippet: Pilots joined with the American-led coalition to fight the Islamic State, it said, even though Parliament had voted against military action there.
abstract: British Ministry of Defense confirms that its pilots have been participating in airstrikes as part of American-led coalition against Islamic State militants in Syria; move comes despite fact that Parliament voted against any direct military action in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Pilots joined with the American-led coalition to fight the Islamic State, it said, even though Parliament had voted against military action there.

headline.main: British Pilots Have Been Conducting Airstrikes in Syria, Defense Ministry Confirms
headline.print_headline: British Pilots Carrying Out Strikes With U.S.-Led Mission in Syria

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
